name: Ralph

topics.response_text: You're my hero, mister. I want to be just like you when I grow up.

topics.topic_text: I think I get the idea. Let me ask you something else.
Don't worry. I'm just here to play Republic with you.
topics.response_text: I like playing Republic. I always get to play as Dave!

topics.topic_text: I think I'd like to meet Dave.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll take you, but President Daddy doesn't always like new people.

topics.topic_text: I'm just a wanderer. I'll be going now.
topics.response_text: Strangers need to stay outside or get permission from President Daddy! Else the Army of Dave will shoot you!

topics.topic_text: I'm not here to hurt anyone. What is this place?
topics.response_text: This is the Republic of Dave, duh! It's named for President Daddy! But you have to talk to him if you want to stay here.

topics.topic_text: Um... I don't think so. I'll stay out here.
topics.response_text: Okay. Just don't hang around the fence. President Daddy's guards don't like that.

topics.topic_text: Wait, who's this Dave guy, and why does he have his own Republic?
topics.response_text: He's the president of the Republic of Dave, duh. You can ask over at the Museum of Dave if you don't believe me.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I think I have all the info I need.
Have you considered running for the presidency?
topics.response_text: I can't be the president, I'm just a kid!

topics.topic_text: Have you heard the election results?
topics.response_text: Did Dave win it again? I'd have voted for him if they'd let me.

topics.topic_text: Your Republic is forfeit. Prepare to be reclaimed by the Wasteland!
I'd like to know more about the Republic.
topics.response_text: Um, okay. As long as President Daddy says it's all right.

topics.topic_text: That's all I need to know.
What's your take on the Republic?
topics.response_text: President Daddy is awesome! He buys all sorts of neat toys that we get to play with!

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about this Dave guy.
topics.response_text: He's my daddy! Whenever we play republic, I get to play as Dave!
I have one mommy. The other lady is Jessica. She's pretty, but she's mean.

topics.topic: RDTopicYourselfWhat can you tell me about yourself?
topics.topic_text: So what have you been up to, kid?
topics.response_text: I'm gonna be president when I grow up!

conversation.response_text: I have to go practice my Dave impression, anyway.
You're almost as big as Dave.
President Daddy, there is a Wastelander who wishes to see you, sir!
Leave me alone, Flower. I'm thinking.
Oh, crap, I forgot to do my homework on the Pledge of Allegience to Dave.
He used a gun! Guns solve all problems!
He didn't acknowledge truth, justice, or the will of Dave!
Was it... uh... man... I knew it this morning...

description:
Ralph is a 9 year-old Caucasian Male.

Ralph is a young boy living in the Republic of Dave, known for his serious demeanor and unusually mature attitude for his age. He's the youngest male resident and takes the nation's rules very seriously, often acting as a miniature version of his father, Dave.

Ralph's Personality: Serious, rule-abiding, somewhat curt but can be friendly when treated with respect. Shows wisdom beyond his years and has a strong sense of duty to the Republic.

Ralph's Backstory: Born and raised in the Republic of Dave, Ralph is the son of Dave, the founder and leader of the micronation. From a young age, he has been taught the importance of the Republic's laws and values. Despite his youth, he takes his role as a citizen seriously and often helps his father maintain order. He has developed a friendship with Derek Pacion from Canterbury Commons, occasionally venturing out to visit his friend despite his father's strict rules about leaving the Republic.
